name: Codename Red (akatanyx)
description:
The renowned bounty hunter is out to finish his unfinished job. Will he finish his job?

WASD - movement

Left Mouse Button - shoot

Shift - dash

Esc - pause

R - Restart

"Gunshot, Distant, A" by InspectorJ (www.jshaw.co.uk) of Freesound.org
"Dripping, Medium, A" by InspectorJ (www.jshaw.co.uk) of Freesound.org
"Walking and Running Sounds" by taure of Freesound.org
"Table Smash" by NeoSpica of Freesound.org
"Prison Metal Door Close" from Mixkit
"Shield Bash Impact" by Hybrid V of Freesound.org
Other Sound Effect from https://pixabay.com/sound-effects/

Art made by Amira Shania Nitisara and Daniel Ardi Chandra
Music made by Reynard Pradhitya
Rangga Rahman Ardiansyah as Game Designer
Muhammad Rionaldi as Lead Programmer
